Concept.Comments: used when the user interaction is stopped by a burning operation
Concept.String: A BURNING OPERATION IS IN PROGRESS. YOU CAN CANCEL SUCH OPERATION BUT THE CD/DVD MAY BE CORRUPTED OR INCOMPLETE.

Concept.Comments: A message box to notify the user that the system will have to exit the current environment because the current device is no longer available.
Concept.String: THE CURRENT DEVICE IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE. THE SYSTEM WILL EXIT FROM THE CURRENT ENVIRONMENT.
